data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 104,598 believers in Distrito Nacional, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 800,500 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, move the 104,598 believers in the state of Distrito Nacional to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Japanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, make bold the prophets in Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the state of Distrito Nacional, Dominican Republic has a population of 965,000.

We estimate Distrito Nacional has 104,598 people who might know Jesus, 800,500 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 59,901 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Distrito Nacional to exponentially multiply disciples.

location.name: Distrito Nacional
location.cities_list: Santo Domingo, Bella Vista, Villa Francisca, Villa Consuelo, Ciudad Nueva
